0: assert siegfried(4, "this weather is warm") == "zis vazzer is varm"
assert siegfried(5, "woman writing something") == "voman vriting zomink"
assert siegfried(5, "outrunning smoky smoke") == "uuntuink schmoky smuk"
1: assert siegfried(5, "I am wandering smoothly on a Boulevard") == "I am vanderink smoothly on a Bulvvard"
assert siegfried(5, "The smith will withdraw the cash") == "Ze schmiz vil vidraw ze kash"
assert siegfried(4, "therapy with wrath") == "zerapy viz rath"
assert siegfried(5, "I will smoothing out the wrinkles") == "I vil schmoothing out ze vrinkles"
assert siegfried(5, "The wrapping was a perfect gift") == "Ze vrapping vas a perfeckt gift"
assert siegfried(5, "Writing is a wonderful thing") == "Vriting iz a vondorfel zing"
2: assert siegfried(4, "therapy with wrath") == "zerapy viz rath"
assert siegfried(5, "Whom will you meet at the theater downtown.") == "Vhom vil yu meet at ze zeater dovntoun."
assert siegfried(5, "I will bring wines, anchovies, and smelly cheese.") == "I vil bring vins, unchovies, und schmelly kese."
assert siegfried(5, "Which witch will write this thing quickly.") == "Vich vitch vil write zis zing kvikly."
assert siegfried(5, "Though the worm will struggle through the thorny bushes.") == "Zough ze vem vil schtrugle zrough ze zorny bushes."
3: assert siegfried(5, "I am wandering smoothly") == "I am vanderink unsmootchmily"
assert siegfried(5, "Which witch will write this thing quickly.") == "Vich vitch vil write zis zing kvikly."
assert siegfried(4, "therapy with wrath") == "zerapy viz rath"
assert siegfried(5, "Whom will you meet at the theater downtown.") == "Vhom vil yu meet at ze zeater dovntoun."
assert siegfried(5, "I will bring wines, anchovies, and smelly cheese.") == "I vil bring vins, unchovies, und schmelly kese."
assert siegfried(5, "Though the worm will struggle through the thorny bushes.") == "Zough ze vem vil schtrugle zrough ze zorny bushes."
